info.description: These APIs allow end users to manage Azure Machine Learning Services.
info.title: Azure Machine Learning Service

appInsightsEnabled.description: Whether or not Application Insights is enabled.

authEnabled.description: Whether or not authentication is enabled on the service.

sslCertificate.description: The SSL certificate to use if SSL is enabled.

sslEnabled.description: Whether or not SSL is enabled.

sslKey.description: The SSL key for the certificate.

appInsightsEnabled.description: Whether or not Application Insights is enabled.

authEnabled.description: Whether or not authentication is enabled on the service.

publicIp.description: The public IP address for the service.

scoringUri.description: The Uri for sending scoring requests.

sslCertificate.description: The SSL certificate to use if SSL is enabled.

sslEnabled.description: Whether or not SSL is enabled.

sslKey.description: The SSL key for the certificate.

ACIServiceResponse.description: The response for an AKS service.

appInsightsEnabled.description: Whether or not Application Insights is enabled.

authEnabled.description: Whether or not authentication is enabled.

computeName.description: The name of the compute resource.

dataCollection.description: Details of the data collection options specified.

maxConcurrentRequestsPerContainer.description: The maximum number of concurrent requests per container.

maxQueueWaitMs.description: Maximum time a request will wait in the queue (in milliseconds). After this time, the service will return 503 (Service Unavailable)

numReplicas.description: The number of replicas on the cluster.

AKSServiceCreateRequest.description: The request to create an AKS service.

appInsightsEnabled.description: Whether or not Application Insights is enabled.

authEnabled.description: Whether or not authentication is enabled.

computeName.description: The name of the compute resource.

dataCollection.description: Details of the data collection options specified.

maxConcurrentRequestsPerContainer.description: The maximum number of concurrent requests per container.

maxQueueWaitMs.description: Maximum time a request will wait in the queue (in milliseconds). After this time, the service will return 503 (Service Unavailable)

numReplicas.description: The number of replicas on the cluster.

scoringUri.description: The Uri for sending scoring requests.

AKSServiceResponse.description: The response for an AKS service.

clusterMaxNodeCount.description: The maximum number of nodes that the cluster can scale up to.

name.description: The name of the AMLCompute cluster.

retainCluster.description: Setting to true will prevent the cluster from being deleted upon completion of the run.

vmPriority.description: VM priority of the Cluster to be created. Allowed values are dedicated and lowpriority.

vmSize.description:
VM size of the Cluster to be created. Allowed values are Azure vm sizes.
The list of vm sizes is available in https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/cloud-services/cloud-services-sizes-specs

asyncOperationDetailsTypeDiscriminator.description: Property used by Swagger for polymorphic object generation.

resourceLocation.description: The resource created/updated by the async operation.

maxReplicas.description: The maximum number of replicas in the cluster.

minReplicas.description: The minimum number of replicas to scale down to.

refreshPeriodInSeconds.description: The amount of seconds to wait between auto scale updates.

targetUtilization.description: The target utilization percentage to use for determining whether to scale the cluster.

authorityUrl.description: The authority URL used for authentication

certificate.description: The content of the certificate used for authentication

isCertAuth.description: Is it using certificate to authenticate. If false then use client secret

resourceUri.description: The resource the service principal/app has access to

storeName.description: The Azure Data Lake store name

tenantId.description: The ID of the tenant the service principal/app belongs to

thumbprint.description: The thumbprint of the certificate above

endpoint.description: The Azure PostgreSQL server host endpoint

authorityUrl.description: The authority URL used for authentication

certificate.description: The content of the certificate used for authentication

isCertAuth.description: Is it using certificate to authenticate. If false then use client secret

resourceUri.description: The resource the service principal/app has access to

tenantId.description: The ID of the tenant the service principal/app belongs to

thumbprint.description: The thumbprint of the certificate above

blobCacheTimeout.description: If this is an Microsoft.MachineLearning.DataStore.Contracts.DataStoreType.AzureBlob, the length of time (in seconds) to cache files locally after they are accessed (downloaded).

clientCredentials.description: Service principal credential when credential type is Microsoft.MachineLearning.DataStore.Contracts.AzureStorageCredentialTypes.ClientCredentials

isSas.description: Indicate if we are using SAS token or Account Key (Deprecated)

protocol.description: The protocol to use. Defaults to https

BaseEventDto.description: Base event is the envelope used to post event data to the Event controller

authorityUrl.description: The authority URL used for authentication

certificate.description: The content of the certificate used for authentication

isCertAuth.description: Is it using certificate to authenticate. If false then use client secret

resourceUri.description: The resource the service principal/app has access to

tenantId.description: The ID of the tenant the service principal/app belongs to

thumbprint.description: The thumbprint of the certificate above

cpuCores.description:
Default size corresponds to the largest container supported in all regions.
Details: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/container-instances/container-instances-quotas

memoryGb.description: The memory available for the container instance.

region.description: Defaults to the region of the workspace.

ContainerResourceRequirements.description: The resource requirements for the container (cpu and memory).

cpu.description: The number of CPU cores on the container.

fpga.description: The number of FPGA cores in the container.

gpu.description: The number of GPU cores in the container.

memoryInGB.description: The amount of memory on the container in GB.

endTimeUtc.description: The end time of the run in UTC.

parentRunId.description: The parent of the run if the run is hierarchical; otherwise, Null.

runId.description: The identifier for the run. Run IDs must be less than 256 characters and contain only alphanumeric characters with dashes and underscores.

startTimeUtc.description: The start time of the run in UTC.

status.description: The status of the run. The Status string value maps to the RunStatus Enum.

userName.description:
A user's full name or a service principal's app ID.
This is PII and should never be logged.

userObjectId.description:
A user or service principal's object ID.
This is PII and should never be logged.

userTenantId.description:
A user or service principal's tenant ID.
This is PII and should never be logged.

dataStoreName.description: The name of the data store.

mode.description: Operation on the datastore, mount, download, upload.

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite the data if existing.

pathOnCompute.description: The path on the compute target.

azureDataLakeSection.description: Data Specific to azure data lake

azureSqlDatabaseSection.description: Data specific to azure SQL database

dataStoreType.description: The Azure storage service this datastore points to.

hasBeenValidated.description: A read only property that denotes whether the service datastore has been validated with credentials.

id.description: The id of the dataset reference.

name.description: The name of the dataset reference.

DebugInfoResponse.description: Internal debugging information not intended for external clients.

data.description: The data associated with the error.

baseImage.description: The name of the base Docker image.

baseImageRegistryInfo.description: The details of the base image registry.

dockerFileUri.description: The Uri to the docker file.

driverProgram.description: The name of the driver file.

DockerImageRequest.description: Request to create a Docker image.

dockerFileUri.description: The Uri to the docker file.

driverProgram.description: The name of the driver file.

generatedDockerFileUri.description: The Uri to the generated docker file.

arguments.description: Extra arguments to the Docker run command.

baseImage.description: Base image used for Docker-based runs.

baseImageRegistry.description: Image registry that contains the base image.

enabled.description: Set True to perform this run inside a Docker container.

gpuSupport.description: Run with NVidia Docker extension to support GPUs.

sharedVolumes.description: Set False if necessary to work around shared volume bugs on Windows.

shmSize.description: The shared memory size setting for NVidia GPUs.

docker.description: The definition of a Docker container.

environmentVariables.description: Definition of environment variables to be defined in the environment.

spark.description: The configuration for a Spark environment.

target.description: The target of the error (e.g., the name of the property in error).

correlation.description: Dictionary containing correlation details for the error.

error.description: The top level error that occurred.

numReplicas.description: The number of replicas in the web service.

sslEnabled.description: Whether or not SSL is enabled.

FPGAServiceCreateRequest.description: The request to create a FPGA service.

ipAddress.description: The IP address of the service.

numReplicas.description: The number of replicas in the web service.

sslEnabled.description: Whether or not SSL is enabled.

FPGAServiceResponse.description: The response for a FPGA service.

directoriesToWatch.description: The list of directories to monitor and upload files from.

outputCollection.description: Set to true to collect outputs and store in run history.

ImageRequestBase.description: Request to create an Azure Machine Learning Image.

imageRequestBaseTypeDiscriminator.description: Property used by Swagger for polymorphic object generation.

kvTags.description: The image tag dictionary. Tags are mutable.

properties.description: The image property dictionary. Properties are immutable.

createdTime.description: The time the image was created.

imageBuildLogUri.description: The Uri to the image build logs.

imageResponseBaseTypeDiscriminator.description: Property used by Swagger for polymorphic object generation.

kvTags.description: The image tag dictionary. Tags are mutable.

modifiedTime.description: The time the image was last modified.

properties.description: The image properties dictionary. Properties are immutable.

innerError.description: A nested list of inner errors. When evaluating errors, clients MUST traverse through all of the nested innererrors and choose the deepest one that they understand.

failureThreshold.description: The number of failures to allow before returning an unhealthy status.

initialDelaySeconds.description: The delay before the first probe in seconds.

periodSeconds.description: The length of time between probes in seconds.

successThreshold.description: The number of successful probes before returning a healthy status.

datasets.description: The list of datasets associated with the model.

experimentName.description: The name of the experiment where this model was created.

kvTags.description: The Model tag dictionary. Items are mutable.

mimeType.description: The MIME type of Model content. For more details about MIME type, please open https://www.iana.org/assignments/media-types/media-types.xhtml

properties.description: The Model preperty dictionary. Properties are immutable.

runId.description: The RunId that created this model.

unpack.description: Indicates whether we need to unpack the Model during docker Image creation.

url.description: The URL of the Model. Usually a SAS URL.

version.description: The Model version assigned by Model Management Service.

ModelErrorResponse.description: The Model Management Service Error object.

details.description: An array of error detail objects.

ModelOperationalState.description: The operational state of the Model.

value.description: An array of objects of type T.
An array of objects of type T.
An array of objects of type T.
An array of objects of type T.

nextLink.description: A continuation link (absolute URI) to the next page of results in the list.

ProfileRequestBase.description: The request for createing a profile.

kvTags.description: The profile tags dictionary. Tags are mutable.

latencyInMsAtRecommendedCpu.description: The recommended CPU latency in milliseconds.

latencyInMsAtRecommendedMemory.description: The recommended memory latency in milliseconds.

properties.description: The profile properties dictionary. Properties are immutable.

recommendedMemoryInGB.description: The recommended amout of memory to allocate in GB.

interpreterPath.description: The python interpreter path. This is only used when user_managed_dependencies=True.

userManagedDependencies.description: True means that AzureML reuses an existing python environment; False means that AzureML will create a python environment based on the Conda dependencies specification.

continuationToken.description: The continuation token to use for getting the next set of resources.

filter.description:
Allows for filtering the collection of resources.
The expression specified is evaluated for each resource in the collection, and only items where the expression evaluates to true are included in the response.
See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/search/query-odata-filter-orderby-syntax for details on the expression syntax.

orderBy.description:
The comma separated list of resource properties to use for sorting the requested resources.
Optionally, can be followed by either 'asc' or 'desc'

top.description:
The maximum number of items in the resource collection to be included in the result.
If not specified, all items are returned.

keyType.description: Specification for which type of key to generate.

keyValue.description: The value the key is set to.

debugInfo.description: An internal repesentation of the error. May be null for non-AzureML services.

details.description: The related errors that occurred during the rquest.

innerError.description: A nested list of inner errors. When evaluating errors, clients MUST traverse through all of the nested innererrors and choose the deepest one that they understand.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

target.description: The target of the error (e.g., the name of the property in error).

amlCompute.description:
The attribute is used to configure details of the compute target to be created during experiment.
The configuration only takes effect when the target is set to "amlcompute".

arguments.description: Command line arguments for the python script file.

autoPrepareEnvironment.description:
Defaulted to True, but if set to False the run will fail if no environment was found matching the requirements specified.
This can be set to False to fail fast when the environment is not found in the cache.

communicator.description:
The supported communicators are None, ParameterServer, OpenMpi, and IntelMpi Keep in mind that OpenMpi requires a custom image with OpenMpi installed.
Use ParameterServer or OpenMpi for AmlCompute clusters. Use IntelMpi for distributed training jobs.

dataReferences.description: All the data sources are made available to the run during execution based on each configuration.

environment.description:
The environment definition, This field configures the python environment.
It can be configured to use an existing Python environment or configured to setup a temp environment for the experiment.
The definition is also responsible for setting the required application dependencies.

framework.description: The supported frameworks are Python, PySpark, CNTK, TensorFlow, and PyTorch. Use Tensorflow for AmlCompute clusters, and Python for distributed training jobs.

hdi.description:
This attribute takes effect only when the target is set to an Azure HDI compute.
The HDI Configuration is used to set the YARN deployment mode. It is defaulted to cluster mode.

history.description: This section is used to disable and enable experiment history logging features.

jobName.description:
This is primarily intended for notebooks to override the default job name.
Defaults to ArgumentVector[0] if not specified.

maxRunDurationSeconds.description:
Maximum allowed time for the run. The system will attempt to automatically cancel the run if it took longer than this value.
MaxRunDurationSeconds=null means infinite duration.

mpi.description:
The attribute is used to configure the distributed MPI job parameters.
This attribute takes effect only when the framework is set to Python, and the communicator to OpenMpi or IntelMpi.
AmlComppute is the only supported compute type for this configuration.

nodeCount.description: Number of compute nodes to run the job on. Only applies to AMLCompute.

script.description: The relative path to the python script file. The file path is relative to the source_directory passed to submit run.

sourceDirectoryDataStore.description: The attribute is used to configure the backing datastore for the project share.

spark.description: When the platform is set to Pyspark, The spark configuration is used to set the default sparkconf for the submitted job.

target.description: Target refers to compute where the job is scheduled for execution. The default target is "local" refering to the local machine.

tensorflow.description:
The attribute is used to configure the distributed tensorflow parameters.
This attribute takes effect only when the framework is set to TensorFlow, and the communicator to ParameterServer.
AmlCompute is the only supported compute for this configuration.

RunCountsDto.description: Captures the number of runs in each of the possible run states.

configuration.description:
Fully specified configuration information for the run. Even when that information
is contained in configuration files within the project folder, the client collapses
it all and inlines it into the run definition when submitting a run.

parentRunId.description:
Specifies that the run history entry for this execution should be scoped within
an existing run as a child. Defaults to null, meaning the run has no parent.
This is intended for first-party service integration, not third-party API users.

runType.description: Specifies the runsource property for this run. The default value is "experiment" if not specified.

snapshotId.description:
Snapshots are user project folders that have been uploaded to the cloud for subsequent
execution. This field is required when executing against cloud-based compute targets
unless the run submission was against the API endpoint that takes a zipped project folder
inline with the request.

sourceCodeDataReference.description: Specifies the cloud source data to use for the run.

RunDetails.description: Contains the details of a run.

target.description: Target refers to compute where the job is scheduled for execution.

endTimeUtc.description: The end time of the run in UTC.

error.description: If an error occurred during the run, this will be populated.

parentRunId.description: The parent of the run if the run is hierarchical.

properties.description: The properties dictionary for the run. Properties are immutable.

startTimeUtc.description: The start time of the run in UTC.

status.description: The status of the run. The Status string value maps to the RunStatus Enum.

tags.description: The tag dictionary for the run. Tags are mutable.

target.description: The name of the compute target where the run is executed.

warnings.description: A list of warnings that occurred during the run.

createdBy.description: The details of the user who created the run.

createdUtc.description: The time the run was created in UTC.

endTimeUtc.description: The end time of the run in UTC.

error.description: If an error occurred during the run, this will be populated.

experimentId.description: The Id of the experiment that created this run.

parentRunId.description: The parent of the run if the run is hierarchical; otherwise, Null.

runId.description: The identifier for the run. Run IDs must be less than 256 characters and contain only alphanumeric characters with dashes and underscores.

startTimeUtc.description: The start time of the run in UTC.

status.description: The status of the run. The Status string value maps to the RunStatus Enum.

token.description: A token used for authenticating a run.

tokenExpiryTimeUtc.description: The Token expiration time in UTC.

userId.description: The Id of the user that created the run.

warnings.description: A list of warnings that occurred during the run.

RunStatus.description: Contains the details of a run.

target.description: Target refers to compute where the job is scheduled for execution.

ServiceCreateRequest.description: The base class for creating a service.

computeType.description: The compute environment type for the service.

dependencies.description: The entities (like models and images) that the service is dependent on and that need to be created as part of this call.

kvTags.description: The service tag dictionary. Tags are mutable.

properties.description: The service properties dictionary. Properties are immutable.

serviceCreateRequestTypeDiscriminator.description: Property used by Swagger for polymorphic object generation.

ServiceCreationDependentEntities.description: The dependent entities for the service.

ServiceResponseBase.description: The base service response. The correct inherited response based on computeType will be returned (ex. ACIServiceResponse)

computeType.description: The compute environment type for the service.

createdTime.description: The time the service was created.

kvTags.description: The service tag dictionary. Tags are mutable.

properties.description: The service property dictionary. Properties are immutable.

serviceResponseBaseTypeDiscriminator.description: Property used by Swagger for polymorphic object generation.

state.description: The current state of the service.

updatedTime.description: The time the service was updated.

path.description:
The path to the source directory or file.
The path should not include the blob container
name or fileshare name.
If not set, the path defaults to the root
of the file share or blob container.
The cloud file or the contents of cloud directory will be copied to the working directory of the run
before the user code runs.

dnsSuffix.description: The DNS suffix for the Azure Machine Learning Service endpoint.
dnsSuffix.name: dnsSuffix

post.description:
Starts an experiment run using the provided definition.json file to define the run.
            The source code and configuration is defined in a zip archive in project.zip.

parameters.description: The name of resource group in which the workspace is located.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description:
Two files are required: 'project.zip':
            A zip archive of a folder containing the source code to use for the run.
            'definition.json': A text file that is a JSON-serialized run definition structure.
parameters.name: files

parameters.description: A run id. If not supplied a run id will be created automatically.
parameters.name: runId

parameters.description: The authorization bearer token. The value should follow the pattern: 'Bearer XXXXXXX'.
parameters.name: Authorization

400.description: The run was submitted with missing or invalid values.

404.description: The requested experiment was not found.

500.description: An internal error has occurred and the run could not be created at this time.

get.description: Get all experiments in a specific workspace with the specified filters.

parameters.description: The name of resource group in which the workspace is located.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description:
Allows for filtering the collection of resources.
The expression specified is evaluated for each resource in the collection, and only items where the expression evaluates to true are included in the response.
parameters.name: $filter

parameters.description: The continuation token to use for getting the next set of resources.
parameters.name: $continuationtoken

parameters.description: The list of resource properties to use for sorting the requested resources.
parameters.name: $orderby

parameters.description: The sort order of the returned resources. Not used, specify asc or desc after each property name in the OrderBy parameter.
parameters.name: $sortorder

parameters.description:
The maximum number of items in the resource collection to be included in the result.
If not specified, all items are returned.
parameters.name: $top

parameters.description: Whether to include a count of the matching resources along with the resources returned in the response.
parameters.name: $count

parameters.description: The authorization bearer token. The value should follow the pattern: 'Bearer XXXXXXX'.
parameters.name: Authorization

parameters.description: The name of resource group in which the workspace is located.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description:
Allows for filtering the collection of resources.
The expression specified is evaluated for each resource in the collection, and only items where the expression evaluates to true are included in the response.
parameters.name: $filter

parameters.description: The continuation token to use for getting the next set of resources.
parameters.name: $continuationtoken

parameters.description: The list of resource properties to use for sorting the requested resources.
parameters.name: $orderby

parameters.description: The sort order of the returned resources. Not used, specify asc or desc after each property name in the OrderBy parameter.
parameters.name: $sortorder

parameters.description:
The maximum number of items in the resource collection to be included in the result.
If not specified, all items are returned.
parameters.name: $top

parameters.description: Whether to include a count of the matching resources along with the resources returned in the response.
parameters.name: $count

parameters.description:
The type of merge strategy. Currently supported strategies are:
None - all logged values are returned as individual metrics.
MergeToVector - merges multiple values into a vector of values.
Default - the system determines the behavior.
parameters.name: MergeStrategyType

parameters.description: Controls behavior of the merge strategy in certain cases; e.g. when a metric is not merged.
parameters.name: MergeStrategyOptions

parameters.description: Defines how to select metrics when merging them together.
parameters.name: MergeStrategySettings.SelectMetrics

parameters.description: The authorization bearer token. The value should follow the pattern: 'Bearer XXXXXXX'.
parameters.name: Authorization

200.description: The Run Metrics are returned successfully.

400.description: The request had missing or invalid values.

404.description: The requested resource could not be found.

500.description: An internal error has occurred and the request cannot be completed.
